title: Star Trek actor Anthony Rapp 話 Kevin Spacey 攪鳩佢

replies.msg:

'He laid on top of me': Star Trek actor Anthony Rapp claims Kevin Spacey tried to seduce him when he was 14, as House of Cards star says he 'can't remember' incident and publicly confirms his homosexuality for first time in rambling response

    •Anthony Rapp is accusing Kevin Spacey of making a sexual advance toward him when he was aged 14
    •Rapp told BuzzFeed News that he met Spacey in 1986 who was then-aged 26
    •He claims he was invited by Spacey to his New York apartment for a party and went into his bedroom to watch television where Spacey then appeared 'drunk'
    •Rapp alleges Spacey then 'picked me up like a groom picks up the bride over the threshold... And then he lays down on top of me.'
    •Rapp said that he was able to get away went into bathroom where he shut door before deciding to leave Spacey's apartment
    •Of the alleged incident, Rapp told BuzzFeed News: 'He was trying to seduce me. ... I was aware that he was trying to get with me sexually.'
    •He says he's coming forward now due to numerous sexual misconduct allegations against Harvey Weinstein and others in Hollywood
    •Spacey issued a statement where he said he doesn't remember the encounter
    •He said: 'But if I did behave then as he describes, I owe him the sincerest apology for what would have been deeply inappropriate drunken behavior'
    •Spacey also said that chooses 'now to live as a gay man' and wants to deal with this 'honestly and openly'


Star Trek: Discovery actor Anthony Rapp is accusing Hollywood A-lister Kevin Spacey (above) of making a sexual advance toward him when he was aged 14.


Rapp told to BuzzFeed News that he met Spacey (above) in 1986 while they both appeared in different Broadway shows


Spacey, who was aged 26 at the time, allegedly invited Rapp to his apartment for a party in 1986. Rapp said that he went to watch TV in Spacey's bedroom until after midnight because he became bored. Spacey is pictured above in 1986 in Heartburn


Rapp (above being held by Ed Harris in 1986 Precious Sons) told BuzzFeed News that Spacey then 'picked me up like a groom picks up the bride over the threshold. But I don't, like, squirm away initially, because I'm like, 'What's going on?' And then he lays down on top of me.'


Spacey issued a statement (above) via his Twitter account after Rapp's claims were made public. The 58-year-old actor said he doesn't remember the encounter and apologized. He also said he chooses now to 'live as a gay man.'


Rapp said that he was able to get away after some time and went into the bathroom where he shut the door. Moments later, he opened the door and told Spacey he was leaving. Rapp said that he decided to come forward following the dozens of sexual harassment and misconduct claims against Harvey Weinstein and others in the industry


Rapp said that he thought about reaching out to Spacey, 58, following the alleged incident, but ultimately decided against it.
